column5: Going to Lac Seul ist week in July. What lures and patterns will be best for Pike? Thanks
We go at the same time, and we slaughtered them last year with big perch colored lures, as well as rattlers and deep divers. Didn't try many spoons, didn't really need to.
Wooglin, Did you trool for them or cast? Will the weed beds be up by then?
